51#ifndef AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_H
52#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_H
55#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_SBL 0xA3
56#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_AM3P 0x3A
57#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_PATCH 0xAF
58#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_INFO1_UPDATE 0xA0
59#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_MAIN 0xC0
60#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_CHILD 0xCC
61#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_NONSECURE 0xCB
62#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_INFO0 0xCF
63
65typedef struct
66{
67 union
68 {
69 uint32_t ui32;
70 struct
71 {
72 uint32_t blobSize : 21;
73 uint32_t resvd : 2;
74 uint32_t encrypted : 1;
75 uint32_t magicNum : 8;
76 } s;
77 } w0;
78 uint32_t crc;
79 union
80 {
81 uint32_t ui32;
82 struct
83 {
84 uint32_t authAlgo : 4;
85 uint32_t authKeyIdx : 4;
86 uint32_t encAlgo : 4;
87 uint32_t keyIdx : 4;
88 uint32_t resvd3 : 8;
89 uint32_t crcBoot : 1;
90 uint32_t authBoot : 1;
91 uint32_t resvd2 : 2;
92 uint32_t crcInstall : 1;
93 uint32_t authInstall : 1;
94 uint32_t resvd1 : 2;
95 } s;
96 } w2;
97 uint32_t w3;
98 uint32_t signature[8]; // w4-11
99 uint32_t iv[4]; // w12-w15
100 uint32_t kek[4]; // w16-w19
101 uint32_t signatureClear[8]; // w20-w27
102 union
103 {
104 uint32_t ui32;
105 struct
106 {
107 uint32_t offsetWords : 16;
108 uint32_t sizeWords : 16;
109 } info0;
110 struct
111 {
112 uint32_t encap : 1;
113 uint32_t resvd : 1;
114 uint32_t loadAddrMsb : 30;
115 } s1;
116 struct
117 {
118 uint32_t writeProtect : 1;
119 uint32_t copyProtect : 1;
120 uint32_t loadAddrMsb : 30;
121 } s;
122 } addrWord; // w28
123 union
124 {
125 uint32_t ui32;
126 uint32_t resv;
127 uint32_t key; // For info
128 struct
129 {
130 uint32_t version : 15;
131 uint32_t erasePrev : 1;
132 uint32_t resv : 16;
133 } s;
134 } versionKeyWord; // w29
135} am_image_hdr_common_t;
136
138#define AM_IMAGE_BITMASK_ENCRYPTED 0x00800000
140#define AM_IMAGE_LOAD_ADDR_MSB_BITS 30
141
142#define AM_IMAGE_GET_LOADADDR(common) (((am_image_hdr_common_t *)(common))->addrWord.s.loadAddrMsb << (32 - AM_IMAGE_LOAD_ADDR_MSB_BITS))
143
144#define AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256 ((256 - sizeof(am_image_hdr_common_t))/4)
145#define AM_IMAGE_MAX_CHILD_IMAGE AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256
146
147typedef struct
148{
149 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
150 uint32_t childPtr[AM_IMAGE_MAX_CHILD_IMAGE];
151} am_main_image_hdr_t;
152
153typedef struct
154{
155 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
156 uint32_t featureKey;
157 uint32_t resvd[1];
158} am_thirdparty_image_hdr_t;
159
160typedef struct
161{
162 am_image_hdr_common_t common;
163 uint32_t resvd[AM_IMAGE_NUM_TRAILING_WORDS_TO_256];
164} am_sbl_image_hdr_t;
165
167#define AM_IMAGE_MAGIC_CUST(x) ((((x) & 0xF0) == 0xC0) && ((x) != 0xC0) && ((x) != 0xCC) && ((x) != 0xCB) && ((x) != 0xCF))
168
170
172#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_MAX_OTA 8
173
186#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK 0x3
187#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_GET_BLOB_PTR(ptr) ((uint32_t)(ptr) & ~AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK)
188#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_IS_VALID(ptr) (((uint32_t)(ptr) & AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK) == AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_VALID_MASK)
189#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_LIST_END_MARKER 0xFFFFFFFF
190
192#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_DONE_FAILURE_CLRMASK 0x1
193#define AM_HAL_SECURE_OTA_OTA_DONE_SUCCESS_CLRMASK 0x3
194
195
197typedef enum
198{
199 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_SUCCESS = 0x0,
200 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_ERROR = 0x1, // This should never happen
201 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_FAILURE = 0x2,
202 AM_HAL_OTA_STATUS_PENDING = 0x3,
203} am_hal_ota_status_e;
204
206typedef struct
207{
208 uint32_t *pImage;
209 am_hal_ota_status_e status;
210} am_hal_ota_status_t;
211
